[i]New Mercenary[/i] – When Ogier, The Little Hero enters, create a Young Hero Role token and attach it to him. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.”)[/i]
[i]Pivotal Anchor[/i] – Whenever a Knight you control attacks, you may move any number of counters from Ogier onto them.
